relatedRecords.name: M365 Chicago - Virtual Event
relatedRecords.description: ​Our 9th M365 Chicago event​ will be held on ​November 13th, 2020, but this time it will be a virtual event. We will run from 9:00 am ~ 4:00 pm CDT. ​

relatedRecords.name: The Finding Ada Virtual STEM Conference
relatedRecords.description: For 2020, Ada Lovelace Day is going back to our roots with a day of blogging, Twittering and Facebooking, just like we did in 2009. #ALD20 will celebrate women, advocates and educators in STEM.
